name: Yin Yuh
description: Help Yin Yuh, a cookie-loving spirit, fight his way through hordes of ninjas and warriors to claim an ancient relic.  Which he will then sell for all of the cookies he could ever want.  This arcade style hand-drawn game takes you through 4 areas, 20 fast-paced action-packed levels, and comes with 3 difficulty settings.  Jump and drop between different platforms, stomp on your enemies, and use teleporting portals to your advantage.  Even ride a dragon!  Join Yin Yuh in his epic quest for cookies!
